title: Android 13 will let you adjust the brightness of your phoneâ€™s flashlight
content:
Google rolled out the first developer preview build of Android 13 last month, giving us a look at some of the new features coming in the next big Android release. Along with major changes like new privacy features, themed icons, improved language controls, etc., Android 13 also includes a couple of minor improvements, like the

The post Android 13 will let you adjust the brightness of your phone’s flashlight appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Android 13 will reportedly introduce a new feature that will let users adjust the brightness of their phone's flashlight. Read on to learn more.
